tool_description: This API will provide the latest space news for your project with a summary and all links included
name: SpaceNews
title: SpaceNews

api_list.name: Ping
api_list.description: Check the status of the API responds with code 200
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://spacenews.p.rapidapi.com/ping"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "spacenews.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

api_list.name: Day Articles
api_list.description: You can set the timespan you want to get the articels from the max return is 25
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://spacenews.p.rapidapi.com/datenews/1"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "spacenews.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

api_list.name: Todays News

api_list.name: News
api_list.description: Will provide you the lastest article
